name: JooSport
overview:
JooSport is a new platform to promote and simplify the sport.

JooSport offers all athletes, recreational, amateur, professional, a simple and fun way to play sports. A unique place for those who want to share their passion and experience new emotions. JooSport rematerializes the social world with sport. Get out and move, find and share, for one goal: play for thrills.

JooSport supports the values ​​of sport: fair play, teamwork, passing, solidarity, emotion, cohesion and social integration, self-respect.

No discrimination, JooSport helps you connect and share sport, with people around you.

Available on Web and smartphones, with JooSport you can:

  • Search and find a sports field
  • Easily organize a match, tournament, reserve a sports field
  • Share the sport with your friends, and find other players to complete your team
  • discover new sports, know all sports activity around you
  • Challenge your friends, challenge other teams
  • Track your results, compare yourself to others, become the champion of a place
  • Find a sponsor, a coach to become better

No discrimination, JooSport helps you connect and share the sport, with people around you.

JooSport unites communities and people.
